work.company: United States Digital Service - Department of Veterans Affairs
work.summary: I began as the Caseflow SRE and left having architected the VA's migration to the cloud.

Built a CI/CD pipeline with daily production deployment to maximize team velocity.
Migrated the 30 year old Oracle database that holds all Veterans Appeals to the cloud using AWS DMS.
